name: The King - United Game Jam
description:
Game By Spandan Poojara Made for United Game jam

There are two games in one. You have to complete 16 levels of first game to reach the 2nd game which is an endless game.
First one is a platformer:

A and D to move , W to jump. Objective : Reach the circle.

Second is an endless game:

Touch the falling cubes to destroy them. It is endless

Game is made in unity.
